generate.title: How can I help you to generate a blog post?

support.title: Support Center
support.description: Need help with something? We're here to assist you.
support.hours: Available Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM PST

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I generate a blog post?
faq.a1: Navigate to the Generate tab and either type your topic or paste a URL to generate content from.
faq.a2: Yes, all generated content can be edited before publishing.
faq.q3: How do I change my account settings?
faq.a3: Go to your profile by clicking on your avatar in the sidebar and select 'Settings'.
